short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome new tab, if you enter keywords, it will google it, if you enter a question, it will ask ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab experience with this versatile extension:

1. Smart Search & AI Assistant:
   - Enter keywords for instant Google search
   - Ask questions to get answers from ChatGPT

2. Elegant Bookmark Management:
   - Access your bookmarks on a clean, dedicated second screen
   - Enjoy a clutter-free browsing experience by hiding the bookmark bar
   - Stylish and intuitive bookmark interface for easy navigation

Streamline your workflow and enhance your browsing with a minimalist first screen and powerful functionality just a scroll away.
